title: New Single family home in McKee/Capitol ave nicely area
posting_body: Single family home at McKee/Capitol ave, nicely area.
Easy to access highway 280, close by Chase/Wells Fargo Bank, shopping Mall, FedEx and light rail and fitness center.
Especially only15 mins to SJSU and Google San Jose campus.

A beautiful ADU with 3 beds, 1 baths in 1 single family home with safety and convenience community/neighborhood that is approx.1300 sq.ft features 3 bedrooms including brand-new Kitchen and appliances.
Bedrooms/Family have been updated with ceiling fans.
The unit also Included brand new washer/dryer with plenty of room for storage.
Professional landscaping with a giant clean and neat back yard.
Garbage and sewage included in rent, and partial credit for water usage.
Allowed 1 cars to park on the driveway.
Credit Check (1 from 3 credit bureaus within last 30 days)
Must have monthly gross income 3X of monthly rent ($9600,1st month rent + deposit ($3,200 +$3,200 without pets.
Must provide 2 references 1 must be previous landlord/property manager
Owner pays for garbage, sewer and landscaping.
Tenants responsible for gas, electricity(have solar systems) and water (partial credit for water).
The PG&E bill and water bill will be shared with other ADU(50/50).
